title: San Diego/Balboa Park-Hillcrest
name: San Diego Model Railroad Museum
price: $8 adults, $6 seniors (65+), $4 military, $3 students, $1 children (6-14) free for ages under 6
content: If you have kids or know a train buff, a visit to this fantastic museum should be high on your list. Just like the name suggests, this institution is dedicated to model railroading, with some of the largest model railroad layouts in the world. There are also some interactive exhibits and displays on the history of railroads in San Diego.
